MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH49 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in Wellbrae Close and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and are commencing repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.27PM on 25th March 2021.
